title: paid2
author: paid2
content: Here we go for another Fun, fair and transparent BTC giveaway !    To avoid abuses, here are some basic rules:-I will use bitmover's tool for the draw like we did for the other rounds-No account registered after the 1st of May 2023 will be added to the listFor more transparency, here is the address where the funds for the winner will come from:1Luck1xjq1WgHPG3Ew2LG7ohinza399yr6ROUND #4As you can see  on the wallet's balance, the amount of this giveaway will be +0.00070076 BTCHow to participate ?Easy !If you want to participate, you will need to reply with your username + BTC address.You can participate until the 11th of June at 06:00 pm UTCExample :Code:Username : genesis-blockBTC addy : 1A1zP1eP5QGefi2DMPTfTL5SLmv7DivfNaRound #1 : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5437138.msg61671044#msg61671044Round #2 : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441292.msg61821619#msg61821619Round #3 : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5447291.msg62022769#msg62022769Thank you for those who will participate and have fun guys
